column4: when i enter "sudo echo 7 > /proc/acpi/ibm/fan" to change the fan speed of my thinkpad, it returns "permission denied"... even though the owner is root,
when i enter "sudo echo 7 > /proc/acpi/ibm/fan" to change the fan speed of my thinkpad, it returns "permission denied"... even though the owner is root, can someone help me?
I think it only readsthe speed rather than set it?
i am not sure, but i think i remember that it was possible to control speed, too
